name: Night Run (Jadon L)
description:
It's not always about getting from point A to point B, sometimes you just need to take a drive. Night Run is inspired by the many chill mixes on YouTube, except you choose when to take control and when to just take in the scenery. With 14 unique synthwave tracks and progressively more challenging driving conditions, Night Run is a perfect way to shut off your brain and just drive.

Features:
- 14 unique synthwave tracks
- Toggle cruise control on and off between active and passive gameplay
- High score leaderboard
- Capture screenshots with the push of a button
